background_description: The background depicts a blurred underwater environment, likely a coral reef or rocky seabed. There is a prominent golden-yellow coral formation on the right side, and greenish-brown textured elements resembling rocks or algae on the left and bottom.
explanation: The image clearly shows a Pufferfish with distinct white spots on a greyish-brown body and bright yellow fins. Its prominent features and clear outline make it stand out against the blurred aquatic background, confirming the absence of camouflage.
